content: > this pattern is available for **free** on > my website click the link above **skill level intermediate** **materials you will need ** * suggested yarn d m c happy cotton 0 7 oz 20 g 47 yards 43 m or any cotton yarn in the following colors and quantities one black skein one white skein one purple skein a few yards meters of yellow yarn * crochet hook size d/3 3 mm * tapestry needle check out my other halloween themed granny squares eyeball granny square 1 | haunted harvest 2 check out my animal granny square collection dragon 3 - chicken 4 - puppy 5 - tiger 6 - koala 7 - bunny 8 - chick 9 - ox 10 - mouse 11 - monkey 12 - turkey 13 - piggy 14 - kitty 15 - duckling 16 - frog 17 - chameleon 18 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/halloween-eyeball-grannysquare 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/haunted-harvest-granny-square 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/year-of-the-dragon-grannysquare 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/year-of-the-chicken-grannysquare 5 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/puppy-granny-square 6 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/year-of-the-tiger-grannysquare 7 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/koala-granny-square 8 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bunny-granny-square 9 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/easter-chick-granny-square 10 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/year-of-the-ox-granny-square 11 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mouse-granny-square 12 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/monkey-face-granny-square 13 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/turkey-granny-square-2 14 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/piggy-granny-square 15 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/kitty-granny-square-2 16 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/duckling-granny-square 17 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/frogy-granny-square 18 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/chameleon-granny-square
